title: What industries make use of referral programs
body:
* A. **[Most Successful Referral Program Examples](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#best-practice-referral-programs)** – Famously successful ones, such as Dropbox, Airbnb and Uber
* B.[ **Ecommerce Referral Program Examples**](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#ecommerce) – Huge category, split into the following subcategories:

  * B1. **[Fashion Referral Program Examples](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#fashion)** – Including everything from flash discount sites to watches and designer sneakers
  * B2. **[Health & Beauty Referral Program Examples](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#beauty)** – We’re looking at subscription boxes (makeup, skincare), beardcare products, speciality razors
  * B3. **[Electronics & Gadgets Referral Program Examples](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#tech)** – Cutting-edge hardware, including smart luggage, phone cases
  * B4. **[Food & Beverage Referral Program Examples](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#food)** – Food delivery, detox tea packages, nootropic powders
  * B5. **[E-cigarettes and Vaporizers Referral Program Examples](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#ecigs)** – E-cigarettes and vaporizers
  * B6. **[Home & Pets Referral Program Examples](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#home)** – Mattresses, beddings, furniture and pet supplies
  *  B7. **[Education & Training Referral Program Examples](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#toys)** – engineering toys, educational boxes and bar exam flashcards
* C. **[Other Referral Program Examples](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#others)**

  *  C1. **[Software and Digital Goods](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#software) –** Graphic design marketplace, project management, stock videos and etc.
  * C2. **[Services & Booking Platforms](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#services) –** Solar Panel installation, vacation and hotel rooms booking.
  * C3. **[Other Referral Program Examples For Inspiration](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#inspire)**
* **D. [Referral marketing Resource List](https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/47-referral-programs/#further-reading)** – Links to other relevant posts about referral programs – how to set up referral incentives, how to do messaging and so on.
